headline.main: Russia and Britain Depend on the Vast American Output to Offset Great Losses

lead_paragraph: WILMINGTON, Del., Oct. 5 -- Recent operations on the Russian front and two announcements last week again emphasized the growing importance of armored and motorized vehicles in modern war.
abstract: H W Baldwin on importance of mechanized euipment use, Hitler and USSR repts on losses
